column1: Local Foods////BF got the crunchy chicken sandwich
column2: which was very tasty. A rather simple sandwich of juicy chicken
column4: and chips piled high on a pretzel bun
column5: I have to confess I was disappointed it wasn't "nut-crusted" as the menu claims. I've had the pecan-crusted chicken 'n' waffles at Benjy's
column6: so I was hoping it would be similar to that. Nevertheless
column7: the sammie was delicious (I'm a total sucker for pretzel buns). He also got the cabbage slaw
column8: which I wish I'd gotten instead of the gai-lan.
